类 NetUtil

extends Object

    Check the network utility class.

    Created in Jul 31, 2015 1:19:47 PM.
    作者:
    Yan Zhenjie.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • NetUtil

        public NetUtil()

    • 方法详细资料

      • openSetting

        public static void openSetting()
        Open network settings page.

      • isNetworkAvailable

        public static boolean isNetworkAvailable()
        Check the network is enable.
        返回:
        Available returns true, unavailable returns false.

      • isWifiConnected

        public static boolean isWifiConnected()
        To determine whether a WiFi network is available.
        返回:
        Open return true, close returns false.

      • isMobileConnected

        public static boolean isMobileConnected()
        To determine whether a mobile phone network is available.
        返回:
        Open return true, close returns false.

      • isNetworkAvailable

        public static boolean isNetworkAvailable(NetUtil.NetType netType)
        According to the different type of network to determine whether the network connection.
        参数:
        netType - from NetUtil.NetType.
        返回:
        Connection state return true, otherwise it returns false.

      • isConnected

        public static boolean isConnected(NetUtil.NetType netType,
                                  android.net.NetworkInfo networkInfo)
        According to the different type of network to determine whether the network connection.
        参数:
        netType - from NetUtil.NetType.
        networkInfo - from NetworkInfo.
        返回:
        Connection state return true, otherwise it returns false.

      • isConnected

        public static boolean isConnected(android.net.NetworkInfo networkInfo)
        Whether network connection.
        参数:
        networkInfo - from NetworkInfo.
        返回:
        Connection state return true, otherwise it returns false.

      • isGPRSOpen

        public static boolean isGPRSOpen()
        Check the GPRS whether available.
        返回:
        Open return true, close returns false.

      • setGPRSEnable

        public static void setGPRSEnable(boolean isEnable)
        Open or close the GPRS.
        参数:
        isEnable - Open to true, close to false.

      • getLocalIPAddress

        public static String getLocalIPAddress()
        Tet local ip address.
        返回:
        Such as: 192.168.1.1.

      • isIPv4Address

        public static boolean isIPv4Address(String input)
        Check if valid IPV4 address.
        参数:
        input - the address string to check for validity.
        返回:
        True if the input parameter is a valid IPv4 address.

      • isIPv6StdAddress

        public static boolean isIPv6StdAddress(String input)
        Check whether the parameter is effective standard (uncompressed) IPv6 address.
        参数:
        input - IPV6 address.
        返回:
        True or false.
        另请参阅:
        isIPv6HexCompressedAddress(String)

      • isIPv6HexCompressedAddress

        public static boolean isIPv6HexCompressedAddress(String input)
        Check whether the parameter is effective compression IPv6 address.
        参数:
        input - IPV6 address.
        返回:
        True or false.
        另请参阅:
        isIPv6StdAddress(String)

      • isIPv6Address

        public static boolean isIPv6Address(String input)
        Check whether the IPV6 address of compressed or uncompressed.
        参数:
        input - IPV6 address.
        返回:
        True or false.
        另请参阅:
        isIPv6HexCompressedAddress(String), isIPv6StdAddress(String)
